overall.description: Find indices where elements should be inserted to maintain order.

a.description: Input array. If sorter is None, then it must be sorted in ascending order, otherwise sorter must be an array of indices that sort it.

side.description: If ‘left’, the index of the first suitable location found is given. If ‘right’, return the last such index.  If there is no suitable index, return either 0 or N (where N is the length of a).

sorter.description: Optional array of integer indices that sort array a into ascending order. They are typically the result of argsort.  New in version 1.7.0.

indices.description: Array of insertion points with the same shape as v.
